<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Talisman Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3706) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Esoterica" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=427" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 43</row>

</column>

---

You know how to assemble the supernatural objects in your esoterica into a number of temporary [talismans](/equipment/consumables/talismans). Each day during your daily preparations, you can make two talismans with an item level no higher than half your level. You must know each talisman's formula. A talisman created this way is a temporary item and loses its magic the next time you make your daily preparations.

You know the formulas for all common talismans in the _Core Rulebook_ of your level or lower. You remember your talisman formulas through oral tradition or mnemonics, so you don't need a [formula book](/Equipment.aspx?ID=22) for them.

<title level="2">Talisman Esoterica leads to...</title>
[Elaborate Talisman Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3716), [Grand Talisman Esoterica](/Feats.aspx?ID=3725)
